location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of Sultan Massoud Mirza Qajar Zelle Soltan [Mass'oud Mirza Zell-e Soltan]

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photograph.Dimensions: 87 x 62mm, on card 103 x 63mm.

mods.abstract: Photograph of Sultan Massoud Mirza Qajar Zelle Soltan [Mass'oud Mirza Zell-e Soltan] a Persian prince of the Qajar Dynasty and Governor of Esfahan [Isfahan]. A seal is inscribed below the photograph, and the subject's name is written below the photograph in Persian and on the reverse of the photograph in English. Photographer unknown.
